items.title: Thousands of flight cancellations to begin Friday if shutdown continues
items.description: The Trump administration on Wednesday announced major flight cancellations would begin Friday if the government shutdown drags on.

items.title: Spirit Airlines cuts 5 cities, increasing bankruptcy exits to 18 destinations
items.description: Spirit Airlines will end service to Phoenix and St. Louis as it cuts five more cities from its route map.
